question:
Ramchandra Pant Amatya got military help from which of the following Maratha warriors?
1) Santaji Ghorpade
2) Dhanaji Jadhav
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Ramchandra Pant Amatya who was the Peshwa under Rajaram from 1689 CE to 1708 CE acted as “shadow/proxy king”. He got military help from the great Maratha warriors Santaji Ghorpade and Dhanaji Jadhav.
